hadiths.text: A hadith like this that Ibn 'Abbas ordered his Mu'adhdhin (to summon people to prayer and then make announcement to say prayer in their houses) on Friday which was a rainy day, has been transmitted by 'Abdullah b. Harith. Wuhaib, however, says that he did not hear it from him

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الرحَالِ فِي الْمَطَرِ
chapter.eng-name: Praying in dwellings when it is raining
